title: Manage your commercial vehicle compliance online

details.description: An online service for viewing test histories and roadside check reports for your commercial vehicles and checking your Operator Compliance Risk Score (OCRS).
details.alternative_title: View test histories and roadside encounters online
details.more_information:
To register, you'll need to apply to use VOSA's online service. Fill out the application form and send it to the address on the form. You'll need to have your operator licence number to hand.

$D
[Download 'Operator Compliance Risk Score - application form' (PDF, 178KB)'](http://www.businesslink.gov.uk/Transport_Theme_files/VOSA_Online_report_services_application_form_v1__1.pdf "Download 'OCRS Access Application Form' (PDF, 178K)"){:rel="external"}
$D
 
VOSA will check that the details you've given match your operator licence records. Within 5 working days VOSA will send you a membership and confirmation letter by post, with information on how to use the service.

If you have any questions about how to apply, contact VOSA.

$C
**VOSA**  
 <top.registrations@vosa.gov.uk>  
0300 123 9000
$C

##What you can do##

Once you're registered, you can:

* see your latest OCRS
* monitor the annual test pass rates of your vehicles
* identify causes of vehicle test failures
* see information on roadside encounters, for example when one of your vehicles is stopped by a VOSA enforcement officer

Read more information about the OCRS.

$D
[Download 'Operator Compliance Risk Score - guidance notes' (889,KB)](http://www.dft.gov.uk/vosa/repository/OCRS%20Guidance%20Notes.pdf "Download 'Operator Compliance Risk Score guidance notes' (889,KB)"){:rel=external"}
$D

Find a list of frequently asked questions about the OCRS.

$D
[Download 'Frequently asked questions about OCRS' (PDF, 146KB)](http://www.dft.gov.uk/vosa/repository/OCRS%20FAQs%20Oct%2012.pdf "Download 'Frequently asked questions about OCRS' (PDF, 146KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

*[OCRS]: Operator Compliance Risk Score
*[VOSA]: Vehicle and Operator Services Agency
